name: api_rendering_Renderer

properties.name: allowOcclusionWhenDynamic
properties.description: Controls if dynamic occlusion culling should be performed for this renderer.

properties.name: bounds
properties.description: The bounding box of the renderer in world space.

properties.name: enabled
properties.description: Makes the rendered 3D object visible if enabled.

properties.name: forceMeshLod
properties.description: Force a specific Mesh LOD level for this renderer if the mesh has Mesh LODs. If the value is -1, Unity uses the default Mesh LOD selection method.

properties.name: forceRenderingOff
properties.description: Allows turning off rendering for a specific component.

properties.name: isLOD0
properties.description: Is the renderer the first LOD level in its group.

properties.name: isPartOfStaticBatch
properties.description: Indicates whether the renderer is part of a static batch with other renderers.

properties.name: isVisible
properties.description: Is this renderer visible in any camera? (Read Only)

properties.name: lightmapIndex
properties.description: The index of the baked lightmap applied to this renderer.

properties.name: lightmapScaleOffset
properties.description: The UV scale & offset used for a lightmap.

properties.name: lightProbeProxyVolumeOverride
properties.description: If set, the Renderer will use the Light Probe Proxy Volume component attached to the source GameObject.

properties.name: lightProbeUsage
properties.description: The light probe interpolation type.

properties.name: localBounds
properties.description: The bounding box of the renderer in local space.

properties.name: localToWorldMatrix
properties.description: Matrix that transforms a point from local space into world space (Read Only).

properties.name: LODGroup
properties.description: The LODGroup for this Renderer.

properties.name: material
properties.description: Returns the first instantiated Material assigned to the renderer.

properties.name: materials
properties.description: Returns all the instantiated materials of this object.

properties.name: meshLodSelectionBias
properties.description: Bias to add to the calculated value when selecting a Mesh LOD level.

properties.name: motionVectorGenerationMode
properties.description: Specifies the mode for motion vector rendering.

properties.name: probeAnchor
properties.description: If set, Renderer will use this Transform's position to find the light or reflection probe.
